link.label: Corpus Management
link.text: TACIT's Corpus Management tool aims to provide a simple user interface to provide an easy and efficient way to manage different types of corpora (or sets of documents/text)

link.label: Reddit Crawler
link.text: The Reddit Crawler provides full access to all data available on Reddit.com

link.label: Twitter Crawler
link.text: The Twitter Crawler tool collects text from the Twitter website and writes that data into text files that are readable by automated text analysis programs

link.label: United States Senate Speech Crawler
link.text: The US Congress Crawler collects speech transcription data from the Library of Congress THOMAS Website for present day speeches to as far back as the 101st Congress

link.label: Latin Crawler
link.text: The Latin Crawler tool collects text from The Latin Library Website and writes that data into text files that are readable by automated text analysis programs

link.label: Stack Exchange Crawler
link.text: The StackExchange Crawler provides full access to all data available on stackexchange.com, a question and answer website covering topics in various fields

link.label: UC Santa Barbara Presidential Papers Crawler
link.text: The UC Santa Barbara Presidential Papers Crawler collects text from The American Presidency Project Website and writes that data into text files that are readable by automated text analysis programs

link.label: Hansard Crawler
link.text: The Hansard United Kingdom Parliament Crawler collects text from The Hansard Parliament Website, which contains the official report of all parliamentary debates

link.label: PLOS Crawler
link.text: The PLOS Crawler tool collects text from the PLOS ONE journal website

link.label: TypePad Crawler
link.text: The Typepad Blog Crawler tool collects text from the Typepad website

link.label: Frontiers Journal Crawler
link.text: The Frontiers Journal Crawler tool collects text from the Frontiers in Psychology website, a site that provides an Open Science platform and publishes many widely known open-access journals

link.label: Co-Occurrence Analysis
link.text: Co-occurrence analysis gives insights into the interconnection between terms or entities within any given text

link.label: TACIT Word Count
link.text: The TACIT Word Count plugin was developed exclusively for the TACIT tool as a more comprehensive approach to word count techniques

link.label: LIWC-style Word Count
link.text: The LIWC-style word count plugin was developed using LIWC documentation and reverse engineering of the program to understand and implement the algorithm

link.label: Hierarchical Clustering
link.text: The Hierarchical Clustering tool allows you to visualize the clusters in a dendrogram, which presents a hierarchical view of the clusters (from the input dataset) and their relations

link.label: K-Means Clustering
link.text: The K-means clustering plugin aims to cluster texts into a user-specified number of groups such that the texts included in each cluster are the nearest to the cluster's centroid, and have the farthest distance from other clusters' centroids

link.label: Naive Bayes Classifier
link.text: This tool performs Naive Bayes classification which is a supervised learning algorithm that is used to assess the uniqueness of text files belonging to user-determined set of two or more distinct groups

link.label: Support Vector Machine Classifier
link.text: TACIT's SVM classification plugin can be used to investigate the degree to which two classes can be separated based on the provided data

link.label: LDA Topic Modelling
link.text: TACIT's LDA plugin allows you to explore the structure of topics within a set of documents and the relations between them

link.label: Z-Labelled LDA Topic Modelling
link.text: TACIT's seeded z-label LDA plugin expands upon the capabilities of LDA by implementing the z-label LDA algorithm

link.label: HDP Topic Modelling
link.text: Performs hierarchical Dirichlet process (HDP), a non-parametric Bayesian model for clustering problems involving multiple groups of data

link.label: Online LDA Topic Modelling
link.text: Performs online variational Bayes (VB) algorithm for Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA)

link.label: SLDA Topic Modelling
link.text: Performs supervised latent Dirichlet allocation (sLDA), a statistical model of labelled documents

link.label: TurboTopics Topic Modelling
link.text: TurboTopics plugin finds significant multiword phrases in topics

link.label: HLDA Topic Modelling
link.text: HLDA plugin implements a topic model that finds a hierarchy of topics such that the structure of the hierarchy is determined by the data
